tgt_original: sattvārthe bhavatāṃ kālo viyadvyāpitathāgatān |  codayetsūtradhvaninā tadihāgamanāya tu ||224 ||

cakrākāraṃ tato bāhyaṃ vajrasutradvayaṃ punaḥ ||227 ||  aiśānyāṃ cakravāḍaṃ ca svānupūrvyā pradakṣiṇāt |  sūtreṇa sūtrayetprājñaḥ sarvadiksamatāṃ vahan ||228 ||  animittairasiddhiḥ syāt sūtracchede guroḥ kṣayaḥ |  hīnātiriktato rogā diṅmohe śiṣyavibhramaḥ ||229 ||
dhyātvā pītaṃ trivaktraṃ tu pīnaṃ prajñāṅgasaṅginam |
ādyajahṛt sa ca (ādyahṛjjaṃ ca raṃ)  tryastrābjasthaṃ ruṃ(raṃ)
